PlatformDBConn - Class in databaseConnection
This class provides methods for platform database operations such as adding cups, signing up shops, lending and receiving cups, querying cup holdings, changing cup statuses, and retrieving information about consumers, shops, transactions, and cups.
PlatformDBConn() - Constructor for class databaseConnection.PlatformDBConn
Constructs a PlatformDBConn object and establishes a connection to the database.
PlatformManagementFrame - Class in platformManagementProgram
This class represents the main frame for platform management, providing various functionalities such as managing cups, consumers, shops, and transactions.
PlatformManagementFrame() - Constructor for class platformManagementProgram.PlatformManagementFrame
Constructs a new PlatformManagementFrame and initializes the database connection and UI components.
PlatformManagementMain - Class in platformManagementProgram
The main class for the Platform Management program.
PlatformManagementMain() - Constructor for class platformManagementProgram.PlatformManagementMain
Constructor that initializes and displays the PlatformManagementFrame.
platformManagementProgram - package platformManagementProgram
This package contains classes related to the platform management GUI.
